SEARCH
Module LabAssignment
Package entity

Class WithdrawalRequest

java.lang.Object
entity.WithdrawalRequest
public class WithdrawalRequest extends Object
Represents a formal request submitted by a Student to withdraw from an applied or accepted internship. This entity tracks the justification for withdrawal and its current administrative approval status.

  • Constructor Details

    • WithdrawalRequest

      public WithdrawalRequest(String requestId, String studentId, String internshipId)
      Constructs a new WithdrawalRequest. Initializes the request with the current date and a default PENDING status.
      Parameters:
      requestId - The unique identifier for this request.
      studentId - The ID of the student making the request.
      internshipId - The ID of the internship being withdrawn from.

  • Method Details

    • submitRequest

      public void submitRequest(String reason)
      Submits or updates the withdrawal request with a specific reason. Resets the request date to the current date and ensures status is PENDING.
      Parameters:
      reason - The textual explanation for why the student wishes to withdraw.

    • setStatus

      public void setStatus(WithdrawalStatus status)
      Updates the administrative status of the request. Typically called by Career Center Staff when approving or rejecting the withdrawal.
      Parameters:
      status - The new WithdrawalStatus.

    • getRequestId

      public String getRequestId()
      Retrieves the unique request ID.
      Returns:
      The request ID.

    • getStudentId

      public String getStudentId()
      Retrieves the ID of the student who made the request.
      Returns:
      The student ID.

    • getInternshipId

      public String getInternshipId()
      Retrieves the ID of the internship involved in the request.
      Returns:
      The internship ID.

    • getReason

      public String getReason()
      Retrieves the reason provided by the student.
      Returns:
      The reason string.

    • getRequestDate

      public LocalDate getRequestDate()
      Retrieves the date the request was last submitted or updated.
      Returns:
      The request date.

    • getStatus

      public WithdrawalStatus getStatus()
      Retrieves the current status of the withdrawal request.
      Returns:
      The WithdrawalStatus (e.g., PENDING, APPROVED).
